title: FS: 7 card SC 460-42OP lot with Wheat - SOLD
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: 7 card SC 460-42OP lot with Wheat - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Asking [STRIKE]$140[/STRIKE] $125 delivered for the lot; paypal preferred.  FYI: the Frill is starting to separate at the top; the Wheat is an obvious trim pulled from an SGC 'A' holder.

George Bell (Pitching Follow Through)
John Frill
Charley O'Leary (Hands On Knees)
Orval Overall (Hand Face Level)
Wildfire Schulte (Back View)
Fred Snodgrass (Catching)
Zack Wheat
knocking the price down; if I can't get $125, I'll put these back in the 'vault.'
I'll take them Erick! You've got two Cubbies I want!
